jQuery.solrjs.createClass(baseClass, subClass)
A static "constructor" method that creates widget classes.
Function Namespace Detail
jQuery.solrjs()
Method Detail
<static> jQuery.solrjs.createClass(baseClass, subClass)
A static "constructor" method that creates widget classes.

It uses manual jquery inheritance inspired by http://groups.google.com/group/jquery-dev/msg/12d01b62c2f30671' 

  jQuery.solrjs.MyClass = jQuery.solrjs.createClass ("MyBaseClass", {
     property1: "value",
     function1: function() { alert("Hello World") }
  });
Parameters:
baseClass
The name of the parent class. Set null to create a top level class.
subClass
The fields and methods of the new class.
Returns:
A constructor method that represents the new class.
